website_summaries.verdict: A laundry bag made for travel that can pack down small and expand to hold your laundry when you need it.
pros: Nylon bag can be washed easily
Bag folds into a small case for easy packing
An easy way to keep your clean clothes separated from your dirty laundry in your bags
cons: It does not have an extra carry handle for when it is full

customer_reviews.title: BEST travel laundry bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!!!!! Folds down so small that it can fit in my pants pocket if needed. It was large enough for my 7 days worth of laundry on my last trip and had some room to spare. I washed it with my laundry when I came home and it held up perfectly! Very excited to have this bag and will be purchasing for all of my children.. Update - 1 year in and about 10 trips later, the bag is starting to tear and the fabric is not holding up well. I still love it, just would like a more heavy duty fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Denis

customer_reviews.title: Yeah! No more lost storage bags - this folds into itself and zips.
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I bought a fold in on itself laundry bag years ago. It's still holding in there, but I've been looking for one that isn't ugly forever - for my husband. Can't believe I found one. Bag is a little "crunchy" but that doesn't matter. It zips up easily and holds a ton of clothes. With the drawstring closure, it's easy to smoosh all the air out of them too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E

customer_reviews.title: the items can fall out easily.
customer_reviews.text: There is no drawstring to close the bag. It is a ice size for a weekend trip, but with no way to close it, the items can fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully. I like how it folds up into a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. I like how it folds up into a small travel sized pocket. Used it for 5 months while I traveled the world without problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mefunmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this travel laundry bag. I bought it for a trip to Scotland and England. It’s lightweight, compact and fit easily into a tightly packed suitcase. It’s a good size and held nearly all my dirty clothes from the trip. Once home it folded back up nicely and I packed it away in a suitcase for next trip. Much nicer than using plastic bags which I’ve been doing for years. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis Fan

customer_reviews.title: Handy, odor proof, compact
customer_reviews.text: Makes travel so much more organized and sanitary. It was really nice to be able to divide our dirty clothes from the clean, nd just dump them straight out of the bag and into hamper when we got home. Fresher smelling suitcase on the other end, that’s for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MissAlison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time! I use it in my gym bag bc my suitcase came with one but either way if you’re going to the gym near work, it’s clutch to have one of these! I would go to the gym within my office building.. pack my gym bag for the week so I could fill the laundry bag with my used clothes and not have to lug a gym bag back and forth every day
customer_reviews.author: samantha carson

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute- Hard to Close!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and small, but SO hard to close back up again! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Simple quality travel laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our college son’s Study Abroad trip this summer. He needed a dirty clothes bag to keep dirty stuff separate in his suitcase while traveling, and this worked great. It’s simple, but just what we were looking for. A lot of these online are super-girlie/cute, but this was a nice, simple black bag—perfect for a guy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great assist
customer_reviews.text: This was great to have on a 22 day trip to keep our clothes separated till we could get to the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia 113

customer_reviews.title: Stop using the plastic bags at the hotels and buy this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry bag was incredible on our trip to Japan. Barely any footprint when packed in our luggage and so lightweight you could even put it in a carry-on/backpack if needed. Can’t beat the value for the price and it makes using the single-use plastic bags from hotels obsolete (great for the environment!)
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and very handy for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel !! Made of nylon and double sewn. Made perfect for wet or dry clothes. I travel with mine wherever I go. Really great on any kind of a trip. Can even use for a Medical bag or Medicine Tote.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Travel Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for pleasure and business and this is a must have. Without a doubt. The last thing you want to do is combine your remaining clean clothes with your dirty socks and underwear. This is absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of containing odors
customer_reviews.text: Works great and gets the job done. Seems to be good quality on the last few trips we took it on. Have it 4/5 starts because I have no idea how to file it back up to its compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelers
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work and this thing has been great. Separating my dirty/smelly laundry from my clean clothes has helped reduce the amount of laundry I do when I return home. Well worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Heagy

customer_reviews.title: Love These Laundry Travel Bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the bag shapes into a square when you put the clothes in. I have reordered these. They make great gifts also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big fold out
customer_reviews.text: Good for travel and have washed it and dried a few times and still holds. Light weight and easy to store, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: In concept it’s great, but our sting broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to take this for our Florida trip. In concept it’s great, but our sting broke on first use. :(
customer_reviews.author: kmgump

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Packs down very small and fits a lot of cloths. For my husband and I, we can fit 4 changes of cloths/day for a 4 day trip in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael B.

customer_reviews.title: great little bag
customer_reviews.text: super useful and great that it folds up small when not in use
customer_reviews.author: lolly

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I pack this every time I take a trip. Simple drawstring bag that holds a decent amount of laundry. Easy to fold back up for storage after emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my travelling son. He says it works well for him and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ad

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than hotel laundry bags. Wish I bought this years earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Mousse

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to have along for vacations and various other trips!!
customer_reviews.author: Beekeepers_Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laundry bag for my husband, he loves it. It zips into a nice, neat square for easy storage when not in use. This bag is the perfect size also.
customer_reviews.author: thankfulmj

customer_reviews.title: I really like this travel laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this travel laundry bag! It’s compact size is perfect and it fits easily into any bag. Can’t beat it for the price and it expands very large! I would pay more for a higher quality material. I don’t regret this purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: good for a weekend get-away
customer_reviews.text: too small for a week trip. perfect for a weekend trip.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen N.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get one if you travel!
customer_reviews.text: Unzips and laundry bag folds out to hold lots of dirty laundry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Throw the dirties to the side
customer_reviews.text: What a genius way to stick dirt laundry In a bag and not have to worry about it until you get home!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Worth

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I hoped, nothing crazy about it. Looks nice, folds small. Boom done.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Great place to collect your soiled clothes during your trip. You cannot see into this bag, it will offend no one
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Makes an easy light weight carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Like the idea and ease of carrying. Did what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great bag right size not too big or too small
customer_reviews.author: marcela mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Worth
customer_reviews.text: Great compact laundry bag for travel. Definitely a Travel essential
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used once and now 4 days past my return window. Zipper broke and I found a hole at one of the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for several days of dirty clothes
customer_reviews.text: Was just what I was looking for, so tired of using the plastic bags the hotels have they always rip, this will make dirty clothes so much nicer when traveling!!
customer_reviews.author: Nutty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling and keeping dirty laundry separate from clean clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Laleise

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger and I can see the zipper breaking eventually. Other than that it does exactly what I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Strandly

customer_reviews.title: Travel must
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling. Small enough to fit in your bag but when you open it you have a decent sized laundry bag. I bought my wife one and she liked it so much I bought my self one. This is a travel must. Easy to store when not traveling as well!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: Great size for short trips. Doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: TMPerez

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Inside bag seems fine for travel, but the holder was already damaged upon arrival. Not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: B.T. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for packing in my suitcase. Small and compact, useful for dirty laundry to bring back home to clean.
customer_reviews.author: melinda dammel

customer_reviews.title: Great travel laundry bag.
customer_reviews.text: Works great folds up small, but holds a lot when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This really came in handy...and they were bigger then I that...I'm glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: Cherlie P.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it on my last trip
customer_reviews.text: Fit all my laundry back in my suitcase, worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mscandacev

customer_reviews.title: Small, Light, Simple, Works
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, simple. Loved having this for my backpacking trip.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Everyone will love this traveling laundry bag
customer_reviews.text: Prevents your dirty laundry from smelling all of your clean clothing. Love it love it love it
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: If you need a bag for your dirty cloths this is the bag for you
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling when you have dirty clothes and work great for wet swim trunks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute, but I literally can’t get it folded up back to how it came. Should’ve expected that I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Bag works just fine. A bit pricy for what it is. But I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D

customer_reviews.title: Packs small.
customer_reviews.text: Packs small. Light weight. Really works well for travel purposes. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Blocher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag. I do find it a little small for a week's worth of laundry though.
customer_reviews.author: TD802

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had the most organized bag on my trip. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Laundry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and fast shipping. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pruchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laundry bag to take on my honeymoon and I loved it! It did not take up any space in my suitcase which I loved! Even when I unfolded it to put my clothes in it, it was easy to flatten out in my suitcase to take back home!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. My daughter travels a lot, and she absolutely loves this as part of her luggage. She takes it every time she goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Seppi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am taking this on my trip to Iceland this week. Will see how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Donna  Finley

product_meta.title: Miamica Travel Laundry Bag
product_meta.description: Color:BlackMiamica’s compact, expandable travel laundry bag is the perfect answer to keeping your dirty clothes separate from your clean clothes while traveling. Expands when in use and folds up to compact size when not in use. This lightweight laundry bag is a great alternative to storing dirty clothes in plastic bags. You’ll be practical and fashionable while helping the environment!
feature_bullets: Perfect, compact black with white lettering travel laundry bag conveniently keeps your dirty laundry separated from your clean clothes while traveling
Expandable with drawstring closure, laundry bag starts out small for easy packing and then unzips to open up and hold your dirty laundry
Lightweight, microfiber material is tear- and moisture-resistant
Folded size is 6.3”L x 6.2”W and opens up to 21”L x 22”W size

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars215 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
